Header.title: Plastic Surgery
Header.paragraph: Start your journey to a healthier life and your ideal body!

About.paragraph: Dr Luis Arteaga is a recognized plastic surgeon from Cartagena, Colombia where he acquired his Bachelor's degree in Medicine and specialized in General Surgery at The University of Cartagena.  Later on, he performed specialization studies in Human Anatomy, at The University of Antioquia and, continuing with his academic training, he advanced studies in Cosmetic Surgery at The Colombian Academy of Aesthetic Surgery endorsed by The IACS (International Academy of Cosmetic Surgery).
Why: Natural results suitable to your body type
Get to know Cartagena and all it has to offer!

Services.name: Transportation
Services.text: Our package includes transportation from your arrival destination to our attention center

Services.name: Stay
Services.text: We offer your safe recovery in a private hotel in which you'll have proper care by our nurses.

Services.name: Nutritional plan
Services.text: Our service includes a dietary plan to guarantee you start a journey to a healthier life style.

Services.name: Post operative care
Services.text: We offer personal medical attention by our nurses for as long as your surgery requires it.

Services.name: Medicine Kit
Services.text: Our kit includes every medicine and gardments you might need for a perfect recovery.
